attributes.additional_details:
* Game shooting should continue to be legal.
* They are breed to be hunted.
* They provide butchers with food as the game keepers sell the shot game.
* If people want high quality fresh food this is the way to receive it.
* When the birds aren't being hunted they enjoy free roaming outside with food. Without this sport you would find the game live in cages and are just fed and killed.
